thread.title: Stylish, comfortable, convenient East End hotel & excellent value!
thread.title_full: Stylish, comfortable, convenient East End hotel & excellent value! - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Perry B
title: Stylish, comfortable, convenient East End hotel & excellent value!
text:
Well located at the base of Brick Lane in the East End, near art galleries, excellent South Asian and Middle Eastern restaurants and a short walk to many clubs, the Arbor City Hotel is a real find! A very comfortable base for our family's week long trip to London at Christmastime, the Arbor City is around the corner from the Tube and bus lines that easily take you to all the main sights in London. If you like to walk, it is not far from the City, Tower of London, as well as the amenities in Shoreditch, a very lively restaurant and bar scene. The staff were friendly and helpful with directions on how to get around and general useful suggestions and arranged to smoothly get us to Heathrow early on New Years Eve as many of London's main streets were closing for the upcoming festivities. Couldn't recommend it highly enough!
Room Tip: Our room overlooked Brick Lane, but was quite surprisingly quiet throughout. See more room tips
